__e: Do you know, I was born down the road about five miles... Before there even was a road.
I did not know there was a good death and a bad death.
At the moment , though, let us confine ourselves to the situation in your home as it existed prior to you brother's murder.
No matter what happens. I don't know how I existed before I met you.
(It's a bit like sex education that did not exist before 1968 ... )

It’s been a year and a half since the internship to my current job and I couldn’t be happier than I am now. Thanks to this scholarship, my expectations and anxieties had a confidence boost, because the financial support was there and it became easier to focus on what was important.
3 days ago you didn't know it existed, now you want to teach me where it is.
Twenty-four hours ago he didn't exist... and then, uh, I'd throw myself under a train for him now.
There was a man in the city today searching for you:
Bob, there's only one way you could head back toward earth.
I will be reading a children's story to the likes of you now A long time ago, there was an old man and woman
Hey, that wasn't here five years ago.
Always at the back of my mind, there was the possibility that one day perhaps...
There was always the chance, if you did, I would be a stranger to you.
Perhaps that was what no longer existed:
Trouble is, I'd been back there and I knew that it just didn't exist anymore.
He said as far as he was concerned, I no longer exist.
